trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to create an asymmetric signature key or an asymmetric exchange key.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否要建立非對稱簽章金鑰或非對稱交換金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Use the KeyNumber enumeration with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo.KeyNumber%2A> property to inspect a key type or with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.KeyNumber> field to specify a key type.
trans-unit.target: 使用與 KeyNumber 列舉<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo.KeyNumber%2A>屬性來檢查索引鍵的類型或<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.KeyNumber>欄位來指定索引鍵的類型。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.KeyNumber> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo.KeyNumber%2A>

trans-unit.source: An exchange key pair used to encrypt session keys so that they can be safely stored and exchanged with other users.
trans-unit.target: 交換金鑰組，可用來加密工作階段金鑰，使它們可以安全地儲存和與其他使用者交換。

trans-unit.source: This value corresponds to the AT_KEYEXCHANGE value used in the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI).
trans-unit.target: 這個值對應於所使用的 unmanaged Microsoft 密碼編譯 API (CAPI) 的 AT_KEYEXCHANGE 值。

trans-unit.source: A signature key pair used for authenticating digitally signed messages or files.
trans-unit.target: 簽章金鑰組，用來驗證數位簽章的訊息或檔案。

trans-unit.source: This value corresponds to the AT_SIGNATURE value used in the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI).
trans-unit.target: 這個值對應於所使用的 unmanaged Microsoft 密碼編譯 API (CAPI) 的 AT_SIGNATURE 值。
